source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_SEQ_00<tab>Fyuu wishes to counteract the aggressive actions of the Coral Tridents.
target: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_SEQ_00<tab>ノォヴの育成地のフュウは、冒険者に「珊瑚の銛」を牽制してほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_SEQ_01<tab>Fyuu is concerned that the battle standards erected by the Coral Tridents will unduly provoke the soldiers manning the tidegates. Take the flint stones given to you by the spawnling to the Sahagin Landbase, and burn these symbols of war and violence.
target: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_SEQ_01<tab>フュウから、「珊瑚の銛」が人を挑発するために掲げた<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E939F01 /var>を燃やすよう頼まれた。北防波壁前と南防波壁前にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E939F01 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897901 /var>」を使って火をつけよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_SEQ_02<tab>You have set the Coral Tridents' battle standards aflame. Return to Fyuu at Novv's Nursery and report your success.
target: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E939F01 /var>を燃やした。ノォヴの育成地の「フュウ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_SEQ_03<tab>Fyuu is certain that your small act of vandalism has struck a subtle blow for Novv's campaign for peace. Though his clutch prefers to take the diplomatic route whenever possible, the young Sahagin believes a more direct approach is the only option for dealing with his fanatical kin.
target: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_SEQ_03<tab>フュウに報告した。乱暴な行為だったものの、これで人とサハギン族の大きな争いは避けられるだろうとフュウは語る。再び争いの火種が生じた際には、彼に協力して争いを防ごう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_TODO_00<tab>Burn the Sahagin battle standards found in front of the tidegates.
target: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_TODO_00<tab>防波壁前の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E939F01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897901 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_000<tab>Pshhh... The Coral Tridentsss have erected battle ssstandards mere paces from the tidegatesss. It ssseems dangerousss to me to let them ssso provoke the sssoldiers who man the walls.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_000<tab>フスィーッ……「珊瑚の銛」のイキがった馬鹿どもが、
防波壁の目の前に、自分たちの旗を掲げているらしい。
ヒレナシどもに威勢を示し、挑発しようって魂胆さ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_001<tab>I know the clutchfather counsssels dissscussion over dessstruction, but─unlike my ssspawnbrother Pyuu─I do not think the Tridentsss would ressspond well to a polite requessst.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_001<tab>親父は平和的解決を望んでるみてぇだが、
「珊瑚の銛」は、説得に応じるようなタマじゃない！
それに俺は親父ほど、デキた大人じゃないんでね！

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_002<tab>I believe a sssmall act of vandalism is in order. Take these flint ssstones, and ssstrike sssparks onto their war banners. They shhhould burn nicely.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_002<tab>ちぃとばかし、暴力的にいくぜ？
奴らの旗を、この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897901 /var>」で燃やしちまえ！フスィーッ……！

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_003<tab>Take the flint ssstones I gave you, and burn those battle ssstandards! The Tridents' ssstance towards reasoned dissscourse is well known─if we cannot turn them from their path with words, then we must ssseek to counteract their hossstility!
target:
TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_003<tab>奴らの旗を、その「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897901 /var>」で燃やしちまえ！
フスィーッ……連中を言い聞かせるのは不可能だからな、
目に見えてるものを、焼きつくしてやるんだ！

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_020<tab>Well done, shhhorewalker! A sssimple act, to be shhhure, but you have ssstruck a sssubtle blow for our cause.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_020<tab>フスィーッ……やりやがったな、アンタ最高だ！
これくらい手荒いほうが、
「珊瑚の銛」の連中にはちょうどいいぜ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_021<tab>Pshhh. My clutchmates think me hot-headed, and Clutchfather Novv often ssscolds me for my temper...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_021<tab>俺は兄弟の中でも、人一倍血の気が多く、
乱暴すぎると親父にもよく怒られるんだが……

source: TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_022<tab>But the direct approach is the <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> approach when it comes to the Coral Tridentsss. And do not forget: all we do, we do to prevent a greater conflict with your finless peoples.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH102_01380_FYUU_000_022<tab>話のできねぇ奴には、やっぱ拳で言い聞かせねぇとだよな？
それに、これはヒレナシとの殲滅戦を未然に防ぐため……。
いわゆる「大事の前の小事」ってやつよ、フスィーッ！
